ing: 1 tablespoon black bean sauce with garlic
n: Grilled Chicken with Ginger and Black Bean Sauce
des: "Tender, juicy, grilled chicken thighs you can enjoy with new potatoes, corn, and a fresh garden salad. You may want to add some apple wood chips to the grill for a wonderful, light, smoke flavor."
ins:
Place thighs in a bowl, and add ginger, black bean sauce, sesame oil, and ground black pepper.  Stir well until completely coated.  Marinate in the refrigerator for 2 hours.
Grill over medium heat until no longer pink but still juicy, about 20  minutes, turning only once.
